text: Veruyushchiye da ne budut druzhit' s neveruyushchimi, prenebregaya [druzhboy] s veruyushchimi. A yesli kto druzhit s neveruyushchimi, to on ne zasluzhit nikakogo voznagrazhdeniya ot Allakha, za isklyucheniyem tekh sluchayev, kogda vam grozit opasnost' s ikh storony. Allakh predosteregayet vas ot samogo Sebya, i k Allakhu vy budete vozvrashcheny
